alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 12:25AM PST until December 05 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain or freezing drizzle. Snow possible. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Any snow accumulations should be less than one inch. * WHERE...Cascade Foothills in Lane County and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light, mixed precipitation will develop over the coming hours, but should mostly be rain below 3000 feet. Cold air trapped in mountain valleys will likely lead to pockets of freezing rain or drizzle, which would lead to slick roads if untreated.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit https://www.tripcheck.com

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County
